metadata.title: CVE-2020-17530 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Forced OGNL evaluation, when evaluated on raw user input in tag attributes,may lead to remote code execution. Affected software : Apache Struts 2.0.0- Struts 2.5.25.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
